name: Proom
description:
Independent roguelite high-dificulty game with procedural levels

Some small online features are in it, for example, you can sign a route with your name then other players can see who wast the first one on try it (and may find a corrupted version of your avatar if u died on that route)

created by Leandro Dorta (LeandroDreamer) using open source tools (Godot, Blender, Krita, etc)

Music (cc-by): Lloyd Rodgers . Rafael Krux . Kevin MacLeod . Brian Boyko . Alexander Nakarada
